document.full_text: as the u.s. government moves closer to shutting down, the financial industry -- which relies on federal regulators for everything from guaranteeing mortgages to processing regulatory filings -- is bracing for the impact.
document.title: what a government shutdown means for wall street
lines_and_colors: as the u.s. government moves closer to shutting down, the financial industry -- which relies on federal regulators for everything from guaranteeing mortgages to processing regulatory filings -- is bracing for the impact.
